newsitem.title: USA: Wash Mutual to submit deal to holders soon.
newsitem.headline: Wash Mutual to submit deal to holders soon.

text.p: Washington Mutual Inc said its merger agreement with Great Western Financial Corp will be submitted for approval by shareholders of both companies in the very near future.
It said H.F. Ahmanson and Co's consent solicitation will not affect the schedule for shareholder approval or completion of its deal with Great Western.

Earlier, Ahmanson said it received consents for a majority on three proposals of its consent solicitation. Washington Mutual said it remained confident its merger will be overwhelmingly approved by the shareholders of both companies.
